description.para: Updates the access and modification times of a file.

syntax.cmd_param: [-?] [/c] [/f] [/t year month day hour min sec] filenames

param.param_note: Does not create the file if it does not already exist.
Attempts to force the touch in spite of read and write permissions on a file.

param.param_name: /t year month day hour min sec
param.param_note: Uses the specified time instead of the current time. The time format is: yyyy mm dd hh mm ss .If does not specify time, touch uses current system time to modify file time.
File name of the file that need to change time, supports wildcard * and ?

example.eg_note: This sets the last access and modification times of the file.txt file in the current directory to the current system date and time.
This gives the file.txt file of the current directory a time stamp of 2:22:2 a.m. on November 1st., 2001.
